name: draggingly
content:

very slowly, or in a way that feels slow and boring: Time was passing more draggingly than ever. She went draggingly down the stairs to face her punishment. Related word
drag
More examplesFewer examplesThe time passed draggingly until the train arrived.He came into the room draggingly and pulled up a chair.I watched the clock as the seconds crept draggingly by.He repeated the words slowly and draggingly.The young woman turned away and walked draggingly towards the church.
